General.Name: Jiangsu Rongtai Industry Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Jiangsu Rongtai Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of aluminum alloy precision die casting parts in China and internationally. Its products include automotive steering systems, new energy automotive three-electric system, automotive transmission system, automotive body structural parts and other aluminum alloy precision materials. Jiangsu Rongtai Industry Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Yangzhou, China.
